Body: What would a cognitive linguistics researcher do on a daily basis, and how would they go about conducting this research?
Title: What does a cognitive linguistics researcher actually do in practice?

LastEditedUser.AboutMe: I am currently a junior at Penn State pursuing a B.Phil. in Linguistics and a B.S. in Psychology with minors in Arabic and Statistics. I plan to graduate in 2015 to pursue a Ph.D. in linguistics.

OwnerUser.AboutMe: I am currently a junior at Penn State pursuing a B.Phil. in Linguistics and a B.S. in Psychology with minors in Arabic and Statistics. I plan to graduate in 2015 to pursue a Ph.D. in linguistics.
